Can I enroll in this course without any.label: Yes, You Can enroll in this course without any prior design experience. we will start from scratch.
Can I enroll in this course without any.value: Can I enroll in this course without any prior design experience?

Are there any specific software requirem.label: No, we will tell you time to time no need to have access to Adobe Creative Cloud.
Are there any specific software requirem.value: Can I enroll in this course without any prior design experience?

How will I ask my doubts?.label: There will be a dedicated team of TAs in your Unnayan community that will resolve your individual doubts.
How will I ask my doubts?.value: How will I ask my doubts?

Is the batch in Bangali or English?.label: The batch is taught in Both (a mix of Bangali & English), very similar to the launch video of the batch.
Is the batch in Bangali or English?.value: Is the batch in Bangali or English?

How long is the batch access?.label: The batch is accessible for the duration of 2 years. For consistency a deadline is important and i.e. why we don't believe in lifetime access as it may lead to procrastination and prolonged unemployment.
How long is the batch access?.value: How long is the batch access?

Will there be a Certificate of completio.label: Yes, you will get certificates of completion after finishing all the lectures.
Will there be a Certificate of completio.value: Will there be a Certificate of completion?

Is there a batch schedule?.label: Yes, the schedule will be for alternate day lectures. Additional details about the live mentorship sessions & lectures are shared with students on orientation day (Day 1) of the batch.

Is there a group/community I can join af.label: Yes, an exclusive Unnayan 3.0 community will be there for all enrolled students.
Is there a group/community I can join af.value: Is there a group/community I can join after enrolling?

Where will I find my batch after enrollm.label: You will find your batch in the Your Profile section on the website. Please note, the lectures will be visible after the batch starts on 20th June, 2024.
Where will I find my batch after enrollm.value: Where will I find my batch after enrollment?
